insert into SHARED ( MBR_NO, SHARED_NO, LAST_SHARED_DATE ) select A.MBR_NO -- MBR_NO , B.MBR_NO -- SHARED_NO , C.ROOM_START_TIME -- LAST_SHARED_DATE from ROOM_MBR A , ROOM_MBR B , ROOM C where 1 = 1 and A.ROOM_NO = C.ROOM_NO and A.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO and A.MBR_NO != B.MBR_NO
and A.ROOM_NO in
#{item.roomNo}
on duplicate key update LAST_SHARED_DATE = C.ROOM_START_TIME
